website_summaries.verdict: A more fashionable style of Chacos, the Dorra sandal features slender leather straps with a toe ring, and has an extra layer of underfoot cushion for all-day comfort.
pros: More stylish than other versions of Chacos, soft leather, can be dressed up or down
cons: More support than regular sandals, but less support than other styles of Chacos

customer_reviews.title: Cute! Strap placement may cause problems
customer_reviews.text: I love these sandals! They are cute and comfortable, with a good sole and nice smooth footbed. But I did decide to return them just because the strap placement hit right at my bunion on my right foot. For limited walking around, they'd be fine for me, but I need a pair that my feet can handle all day long. For anyone without this problem, I highly recommend. I wear size 7 1/2 and the size 7 fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Arch is great, no rubbing
customer_reviews.text: I choose these over my tennis shoes for walks through my neighborhood. Arch is great, no rubbing. I've had them for about a month and have worn them so much! I am a normal 10, with a skinnier foot. And they fit perfectly! 2 month review- took them on my trip to California. Did hearst Castle, Alcatraz, multiple walks along the beach, walks through Cambria, and they just keep getting better!!
customer_reviews.author: J. Fernbach

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE SANDALS
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THESE SANDALS. Mine are in the color mecca. They definitely fit a full size smaller than whatever size you wear in other shoes. I'm a 7 in all shoes and these fit me perfectly in a 6. Straps felt a little tight the first few times but once I broke them in for a week or so they fit like a dream.
customer_reviews.author: Haley Waddell

customer_reviews.title: Love em!
customer_reviews.text: Wore these for 5 days at Disneyland - very long days with lots of walking!! They held up beautifully and, while my feet were a little ouchy here and there, did not need to wear other shoes on alternate days and no blisters!! Yay! That makes them a win. I have some other Chaco's and I find it hard to get my big toe into the front part with them ... not so with these ones...they stretched easily to accommodate my somewhat fat big toe :)
customer_reviews.author: Cellens

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I planned to return these; they were an impulse buy because the price was low for a brief moment. I'm glad I kept them. Initially I had some issue with adjusting the buckle to find the right comfort spot. On one setting the shoe was loose and floppy on my foot, but on the next one it was a bit snug and I worried about the elastic stretching as others have shown in pictures and comments. Finally went with the slightly snug setting and that was the right choice. I work in a school and spend a lot of time walking around. As the day progressed the shoes loosened and were perfectly comfortable all day long.
customer_reviews.author: J. Freeze

customer_reviews.title: Mecca is just a worn dark brown. I love them.
customer_reviews.text: I'm just putting these on to run errands. So I haven worn them all day, but.. they fit perfect. The arch seems to hit in just the right spot. These are my first pair of chacos and my first pair of arch support sandals. If they feel this good at the end is the day I'm sold. I got them in Mecca and I was worried they would be to red. They are not. They are an earthy coco brown with worn spots in them. I have taken a photo to try and show the color.
customer_reviews.author: Mechelle Marie

customer_reviews.title: footbed too small, straps too large
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to really like these shoes as comfortable shoes with support that I could "dress-up" a bit. I wear a size 7 1/2 in normal shoes but a size 7 for other Chacos I own. The footbed of these shoes was too small but the straps were too big (these straps don't adjust as some of the other Chacos do). I did not try a size 8 as the straps would be even bigger. I was sorry that these didn't work as the style looks really cute! I later tried a different style of Chacos that fit better.
customer_reviews.author: L Prescott

customer_reviews.title: They are very comfortable, but I was really needing something with more ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been wear these most of the summer so I've had a while to form my review. They are very comfortable, but I was really needing something with more support. These do have more support than regular flip flops and such so that's why I wear them so much, but I need more. Usually by the end of the summer I can barely walk due to wearing sandals with no support, but I switch these out with the regular Chacos that I bought and I think that has saved my feet so far this summer. The only reason I didn't give it five stars is that they already look like I've been wearing them for years and years.
customer_reviews.author: Sonya Tino

customer_reviews.title: My favorite shoes.
customer_reviews.text: These are my FAVORITE chacos! I had another pair previously that i wore for 2 years straight- very very often and when they broke last fall, i was broken hearted! But I immediately found the same pair online and got them- and I've not been disappointed at all! They can be dressed up, dressed down, casual, fancy- i wear them with dresses and jeans. I walk a lot in them too.
customer_reviews.author: sara

customer_reviews.title: Y'all try these! I'm so glad I did!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these sandals! Kept watching them on ebay for about a year. I have diabetic neuropathy and haven't been able to wear ANYTHING but 2 specific brand/style flip flops... yes, even in the winter months. (Thankfully I live in Alabama.) Anyways, I couldn't bring myself to spending so much money on shoes that I may or may not be able to wear. I checked Amazon and happened to get an amazing deal! These sandals are amazing! I can even ride rides at theme parks now without having to take my shoes off to sit on them! Lol
customer_reviews.author: Trisha A

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Teacher Shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I have been a huge fan of Chacos for their support and was thrilled that they came out with more dressy leather ones! I wear them to work as a teacher all the time. I find that the comfort level is high and have easily been able to wear them all day long. I think they are really cute and have had strangers stop me twice asking where I got them. My feet tend to be a little sore after a very active full day of wear but I also have pretty sensitive feet. So that might just be me. It does have good arch support though which is what I look for. I would buy again for sure!
customer_reviews.author: lynders

customer_reviews.title: run large
customer_reviews.text: took 2 tries to get the right size for me but they are AWESOME. I normally wear a 6 1/2 and I ordered the 7 fist due to the reviews but they were WAY too big. I ordered a 6 and they fit but are still a little long but not enough to be an issue. Love them and will be ordering at least one more pair because every time I find something I like...woooosh there it goes off in discontinued land.
customer_reviews.author: babyjo219

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy and cute!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! They have a worn in look to them but are cute enough to wear with nicer outfits yet also functional for long walks. Best of both worlds! I walked 5 miles in these on my first wear and I have one small blister by the buckle but otherwise they were insanely comfortable! I don’t think I could have walked that far in any other pair of shoes I own when they were new. The fit is good. I maybe could have half sized down but my normal size fits fine! Just a little extra room in the back. Worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Elaina

customer_reviews.title: Great look and comfortable BUT the elastic piece is fraying and looks like it will break.
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of these and used them on my Europe trip as a comfortable but cute shoe for walking around when I didn't wear my tennis shoes. I got a blister from them at first but that is expected as they were not broken in yet. The issue is one of the elastic pieces on the straps is fraying and I am afraid will snap at any moment so I don't want to wear them in case of that happening. So I spent almost $100 on sandals I wore for a little over 3 weeks and can no longer wear.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good.
customer_reviews.text: So I really like Chacos because they have so much support for your feet. I ordered these so I could wear them to work since they are more dressy than regular Chacos. These however do not have as much support as my classics. I do like them but not as much support as the original ones. Side note, I have had these for a little over a month and the elastic is completely stretched out and is about to break. This makes me sad because I love these sandals and they were not cheap. I expected more.
customer_reviews.author: SS

customer_reviews.title: I’ll-fitting, shapeless sandal and not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: This sandal has no arch support and felt too wide. I had to punch an extra hole for the strap to keep the sandal on my foot. I wish I had returned this sandal and did not find the fit consistent with Chaco’s unusually great fitting sport sandals. I do not recommend this sandal for I must tread carefully when wearing this sandal as it would be easy to slip & fall.
customer_reviews.author: charlie eversole

customer_reviews.title: These are the most comfortable shoes I've ever had however the strap under the ...
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable shoes I've ever had however the strap under the clasp is already starting to fray and I've only had them a couple weeks. I'm glad I paid $50 and not $100. Maybe if I contact Chaco before it breaks they can fix it?
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: I'm really disappointed. I had high hopes for these sandals - ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm really disappointed. I had high hopes for these sandals - I just wanted a sandal I could spend the day walking around my new city in comfortably. Unfortunately, the leather material of the shoe is not at all comfortable, and it rubs an old scar horribly, making the shoes painful to walk in. I hope I can return these. Again, I had high hopes and I'm sad it didn't work out.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Jane

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes!! They fit true to size and are super comfortable. I went hiking in them all day for over 5 miles and my feet didn’t hurt at all!! The best part was they weren’t all sweaty from staying in sneakers all day. They also wash up like new when you get them dirty. I love that these are cute as well as comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Desi

customer_reviews.title: Overall they're a great shoe for the price (I paid $42)
customer_reviews.text: Overall they're a great shoe for the price (I paid $42). My only complaint is that the straps can't get quite tight enough for my narrow feet so my feet flop around a little more than I would like. I was really happy about how comfortable they were to wear while walking around all day. The first time I wore them I walked around Disneyland for an entire day and I didn't have any blisters.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wish I would have known the elastic by the buckle would stretch out and eventually break
customer_reviews.text: These are super cute Chacos. Very comfortable. But for the price, I would expect them to last “forever”. And I have wore them only a few times. One of the shoes, the elastic by the buckle is stretched all the way out and is almost broke. Once this is broke they will not be able to be worn. I wish I could return them. I wish I would have known this would happen. I feel like I should have got lots of miles in these shoes. But unfortunately I did not.
customer_reviews.author: tjwoae

customer_reviews.title: Style of a fashion sandal with the support/comfort of sneakers
customer_reviews.text: I love these sandals! I usually wear a 6.5 and the 6 fits perfectly (as with my other Chacos sandals). It took a couple of days to break them in, but now they're some of the most comfortable, supportive shoes I own! I wore them on a trip to Europe recently and was amazed that I was able to walk 10 miles a day in these through cobblestone streets without ever having sore feet or a single blister. They are still holding up well and will likely last for years.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen F.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! These shoes fit perfectly out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! These shoes fit perfectly out of the box, and they didn't give me a blister! This is truly the first time that has every happened in my life. Took a couple of days for my feet to get used to all of the support (used to Payless flats), but once my feet adjusted there was no looking back. I walked around 20-30k steps each day at a conference a week after these arrived and my feet still felt fabulous. They're also a little bit dressier than normal Chacos, so they work perfectly at work.
customer_reviews.author: brasche

customer_reviews.title: Cute but the edges are starting to curl. I ...
customer_reviews.text: Cute but the edges are starting to curl. I haven't had the shoe that long and for the liner to start curling up from the sole lets me know this Sandler isn't going to last me that long. That being said I am harder on shoes than the average person and walk usually 5 to 8 miles and stand usually 10-16 hours a day.
customer_reviews.author: Sifterthinker

customer_reviews.title: Pretty disappointed so far...
customer_reviews.text: I typically wear a 9-9.5 so after reading some reviews I decided to order the 9 since it says it can run big, WRONG. My toes were falling off the edge so I decided to order a size 10 and they were STILL too small. I have never had to order a size 10 shoe in my life and now I am looking at getting the size 11! This seems crazy since I wear a 9 all of the time, you would think they could get their sizing a little bit better... pretty disappointed
customer_reviews.author: abluestar

customer_reviews.title: Love these sandals
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these sandals. They fit wonderfully. I wear them to work during the warmer months of the year. I am on my feet all day and these shoes are incredibly comfortable. I had an issue with one of the straps after about a year, and Chaco replaced them easily and quickly. I would definitely recommend these shoes and this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Taking a chance with elastic buckle straps
customer_reviews.text: I wish Chaco made half sizes b/c I really need a 8.5 but anyway, that is not my biggest problem. I immediately fell in love with these because of their comfort and style. However, I am sad to report that after less than 2 months of wear, the right strap elastic has stretched out and no longer tight as it should be. After checking over reviews, I am not the only one with this problem. I have contacted Chaco which advised me to check with seller first and if not successful, they can try to repair or replace.
customer_reviews.author: krazyK

customer_reviews.title: Half sizes would be nice.
customer_reviews.text: I have four stars because the shoes aren't in half sizes. I'm a true 6.5 and the seven is a too long but I wear them. I may try the 6 in the brown, I currently have the black pair. After breaking them in they're wonderful! I wear them too work and they go well with business (I wear pant suits), business casual, and casual outfits.
customer_reviews.author: SE

customer_reviews.title: The criss-cross straps covered the end of my baby toe and looked stupid. The foot bed was comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 10, but I have short toes. The toe loop hit me right across the knuckle, restricting my foot and toe flex. The criss-cross straps covered the end of my baby toe and looked stupid. The foot bed was comfortable, but the shoes were just not a good fit for my feet. These shoues would really work well for slightly wide feet with long toes.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Lesnansky

customer_reviews.title: Best walking sandal!
customer_reviews.text: These sandals didn’t have a “break in” period. I wore them on a neighborhood walk and they were totally comfortable. I normally wear a 7.5, since they were whole sizes only I ordered a 7 and they fit perfectly... Hopefully they are as lasting as my other non-leather Chaco sandals.
customer_reviews.author: TEllin

customer_reviews.title: Supportive and Attractive
customer_reviews.text: I am in my mid 30s, and unfortunately have a torn hip ligament, so require supportive footwear. Often, this leads to a compromise on fashion. It is the most supportive and comfortable sandal I've ever worn. My hip doesn't hurt after hours of wear. I would purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are awesome and comfortable throughout the day
customer_reviews.text: I work with kindergarten and preschool students which means I am constantly walking around, sometimes running. These shoes are awesome and comfortable throughout the day. I had no problems with any rubbing or blisters (a concern with the toe strap). I do undo the buckle every day because I read that strap stretched out over time.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Win!
customer_reviews.text: Had these for a few weeks and the weather is finally here! I wore them around the house past two days to break in- super comfy until end of day, but I have wide feet (hence the breaking in) so it's not a surprise. I love these sandals and while I won't be able to take long treks in them until they break in, they're absolutely adorable and soon they will be comfy all day.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: and they were spot on - I love these sandals
customer_reviews.text: I had read reviews about the elastic on the ankle clasps being poorly constructed, and they were spot on - I love these sandals, but after less than one summer, the elastic is near torn. I'll have to take them to my leather guy to fix. Disappointing, considering their cost. Other than that, they're amazing and comfortable sandals.
customer_reviews.author: 5280KFB

customer_reviews.title: Good sandals, need minor design adjustment
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes for a trip and have been wearing them every day. I really like them, they are comfortable to walk in and have good arch support. They do need a design improvement in that the back of the shoe seems to have too much footbed while the front doesn't have enough. My toes are right at the edge of the front of the shoe and I have an inch extra on the back. They need to adjust that in future designs.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Barah

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: A friend recommended that I try the Chaco's brand because she loves hers. The Dorra Sandal is SO COMFORTABLE! It has a slight arch support, which helps keep my feet from hurting toward the end of the day. They look nice with the semi-casual clothing that I wear to work and church... which is why I chose this design first. I definitely plan to try some of the other designs very soon.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley

customer_reviews.title: LOVE, LOVE
customer_reviews.text: LOVE, LOVE, LOVE, these sandals. I can't wear the other strappy style because my feet swell. I can never get the straps adjusted correctly. Too big in the morning to accommodate my swelling feet. These are perfect. No adjusting, the leather gives just enough to not be too tight as my feet swell. Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Be ready to repair them, but it's worth it
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these shoes. I ordered a size smaller than my normal size and after wearing them a few times for short periods, the leather stretched to the perfect fit. They're incredibly comfortable, and I have horrible feet and typically get sore heels but these have been perfect for all day walking. I wish I could give 5 stars, BUT the elastic is barely holding on and I've had them less than 2 months and haven't worn them everyday. I will be taking them to a shoe repairman though, because they are worth fixing for sure. Other than that, they are very high quality shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Mik

customer_reviews.title: I love these! They fit different than the typical Chaco
customer_reviews.text: I love these! They fit different than the typical Chaco. I ordered a 5,6 to make sure I had the correct size. Ended up going with my normal Chaco size 6. Highly recommended. I am on my feet all day long and these are wonderful. Hand crafted leather so it has tiny imperfections,
customer_reviews.author: Primequeen

customer_reviews.title: Very Very Cute
customer_reviews.text: I'm a true 7.5 and I got the 7 based on all the reviews. They are perfect. Love these. If I had to do it over though, I would have gotten the chocolate brown "Dark Earth" instead of the wine colored "Mecca". But that's just because I'm not tan at all, lol.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Harris

customer_reviews.title: Love love love love love
customer_reviews.text: I love love love Chaco sandals. I live in NYC and walk everywhere, and these are my most comfortable walking shoes - they're at least as comfortable as sneakers. The strap that goes around my heel keeps them securely on my feet, and they look GREAT
customer_reviews.author: C E Reid

customer_reviews.title: I wish these came in half sizes.
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the ways the shoes fit and they are very cute, however, if you are between sizes this may pose an issue. I feel that the size up may be a little too big on the toe and the size smaller would be too short where my toes would hang over. Ultimately I ordered up a size and it's a bit big but hasn't affected the wear of this shoe. We will see as I wear them more.
customer_reviews.author: Hausofhaddox

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Sandals
customer_reviews.text: love these for everyday wear. They have more support than most sandals. I can walk for long periods in these.
customer_reviews.author: blue sneaker dog

customer_reviews.title: They were great 👍
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my girlfriend and they were perfect! Unfortunately they were chewed up by her puppy and they don’t make them any more 😢 I tried to buy her another pair exactly like them and they have been discontinued...
customer_reviews.author: Steve Davis

customer_reviews.title: These are so comfortable and supportive
customer_reviews.text: These are so comfortable and supportive! I have plantar fasciitis and when I wear these sandals there is no pain, even after walking around all day. I would definitely recommend them. They are worth the price!!!
customer_reviews.author: prissygray

customer_reviews.title: They are a lot more comfortable than I thought the would be
customer_reviews.text: They are a lot more comfortable than I thought the would be. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: sallysue

customer_reviews.title: gives me blisters :(
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a 6.5 which isnt carried so I got a 7 and its way too big. I tried to make it work, but it looks strange and the shoes also give me really bad blisters unfortunately. :( GREAT arch support though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are perfect for work
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are perfect for work. They do fit much looser and longer than my other Chacos. The soles are not as supportive as the regular Chacos, but I'm not on my feet as much at work. They are super cute and I get lots of complements, perfect for a office setting.
customer_reviews.author: J. Ivey

customer_reviews.title: Cute, comfy leather Chacos!
customer_reviews.text: I am only on day two of wearing these, so I will edit later if I need to. These are comfortable and fit perfectly, and they look so cute! I love Chacos for the good quality, but I wanted something just a little dressier for some occasions. These look so cute and offer the arch support that so many sandals out there lack.
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: Chaos are the best!
customer_reviews.text: Love these sandals!! Chacos are the best. Sole is a little slippery but will change with a little more wear. So comfortable and a bit more dressy-casual than my traditional Chacos. I normally wear a 7 in Chacos but had to get an 8 in these...
customer_reviews.author: Vwink

customer_reviews.title: The sole is the perfect length, but the back strap pushes my foot ...
customer_reviews.text: The sole is the perfect length, but the back strap pushes my foot forward, which makes toes slide to the end...can't stand how this feels. The other version of this, forget what they're called, is awesome though!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Even more comfortable than my Sanuks
customer_reviews.text: These are without a doubt the most comfortable shoes I’ve ever put on my feet. I can’t believe I’ve been wearing any other sandal for the last 40 years of my life. These feel so nice I’m buying other styles too.
customer_reviews.author: nd

customer_reviews.title: Best sandals ever!
customer_reviews.text: These are my third pair of Dorras and despite some negative reviews on here, I have NEVER experienced issues with my straps- I get them wet quite often, too. I try to avoid leaving them sitting out in the sun, and make sure to rinse them well if I get them muddy or in salt water.
customer_reviews.author: rachelkhays

customer_reviews.title: Love these!!
customer_reviews.text: These seem to have been discontinued. I bought a pair last year for myself and now bought a pair for a gift. (She loves them, too). Wish they had my size again as I would buy another pair!! These offer great support and look fashionable! Every time I wear them I get compliments!! Chaco why did you discontinue this style?
customer_reviews.author: George Adams

customer_reviews.title: These didn't have as good of arch support as some of my other chacos
customer_reviews.text: These didn't have as good of arch support as some of my other chacos, but still have some arch support. I added a padded arch to be able to walk in them all day. Ultimately I didn't last an entire trip to the Hogle Zoo in them and switched shoes before we were done, but for less intense walking days, I can wear them for a few hours.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great-fitting sandals!
customer_reviews.text: These sandals are so incredibly comfortable! When I first put them on, I was a little worried because there’s not a lot of apparent cushion or bounce to the shoes. However, the shoes have insanely awesome arch support and kept my feet feeling great after a day of walking around outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: Mogwot

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe and love the look.
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoe and love the look. Not as comfortable as I expected (walk the dog around the block..yes. Walk all day in them..no and having to do up the strap is a bit of a pain each time. Leather does stretch over a short time.
customer_reviews.author: L.A.Fox

customer_reviews.title: While these are pretty pricey, they are very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: While these are pretty pricey, they are very comfortable. I suffer from Plantar Fasciitis and these sandals have made walking more bearable. Don't make the mistake of getting them wet though, or your feet will turn purple on the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Hook

customer_reviews.title: New Favorite Sandal
customer_reviews.text: I love them. They are so well made and pretty. I normally wear size 7 1/2. The website instructed to buy the 7. and it does fit well......except that loop around the toe. It is a tad tight but hopefully it will stretch a bit as I wear them.
customer_reviews.author: angelaiacono

customer_reviews.title: Don't waist your money-  may not be authentic Chaco
customer_reviews.text: Very poor performance. The straps stretched out right away and I cannot wear these after just 6 hours of use. In addition, there is no support and the sole is very uncomfortable. In addition, there is 3/4 inch too much sole BEHIND the back heel strap. What is that for? It just drags the ground when trying to walk.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I can walk around all day in these and be perfectly comfortable in them
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair of these sandals that I have purchased. The first pair is two years old and look almost new yet which is why I purchased another color. I can walk around all day in these and be perfectly comfortable in them.
customer_reviews.author: Razzy2001

customer_reviews.title: Love these sandals
customer_reviews.text: Love these sandals!!! I just bought my second pair (I bought the same pair a couple of years ago and they are still wearable but a bit worn out). Best pair of shoes I've owned. They fit a little big. I usually wear a 7 1/2 and bought these in a 7 and they fit perfectly. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: kachow9

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and Style
customer_reviews.text: Can say enough good things about this sandal. I own several pairs of Chacos and I just love the leather and styling of these sandals. Very well made and very comfortable. The arch for a "newbie" to Chaco can be a bit awkward but once you get use to them you will not take them off. Great support and exercise for your calves!
customer_reviews.author: Rose White

customer_reviews.title: ... the buckle problem that people talekd about but I love the support and fit and I don't have any ...
customer_reviews.text: I haven't worn enough to notice the buckle problem that people talekd about but I love the support and fit and I don't have any problems with the straps bothering my bunions or bony ankles. I have very slim feet but they are bony.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect summer shoes
customer_reviews.text: These have all of the great qualities of Chaco sandals, good heel and arch support. They are also much more wearable from casual to dressy. I can wear these all day running around a city and exploring and my feet don't hate me at the end of the day, they thank me. I want a pair in every color available.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best shoes! I have really bad feet and have had multiple surgeries on them. Finding a sandal that is cute comfortable and supportive seemed impossible until I found these! I love them and would highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: Broken loosen straps.
customer_reviews.text: The sandals fit perfectly and are comfortable, however after only having the sandals for four months, the straps are have frayed and loosen quite a bit. Very upset considering that Chacos are supposed to be well made sandals. These were my favorite sandals.
customer_reviews.author: candice

customer_reviews.title: These sandals are wonderful!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these sandals so much!! I am a long time fan of Chaco's for comfort, I've always loved them. I was so excited to see a "dressier" version. They aren't quite as thick as the others but they are still comfortable and they look really nice. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: mackenzie combs

customer_reviews.title: I had to return these for being too large. ...
customer_reviews.text: I had to return these for being too large. I normally wear a size 8 but these were much too long. The way the straps laid, I just didn't find them very flattering on my feet.
customer_reviews.author: cmcd1070

customer_reviews.title: Chaco Women's Dorra Sandal Fits Well
customer_reviews.text: I initially ordered the Chaco Women's Dorra Sandal, Dark Earth in a size 7, but it was too big. I reordered it in a size 6 and it fits well on my narrow feet.
customer_reviews.author: DiviLyn

customer_reviews.title: A polished take on Chacos sandals
customer_reviews.text: These sandals are great! I needed to up my game to something that would give a slightly more polished edge than flip flops or my usual webbed Chacos and these are just the ticket. I have some concerns about how they'd hold up as other reviewers have mentioned the stitching on the elastic. I love the earthy color, not too brown and not too tan. I've worn these sandals with skirts, shorts and jeans and know I'll find them useful. They are very comfortable and provide some arch support but not as much as my "regular" Chacos. All in all a good purchase. Hopefully they'll be durable. I'll update at the end of the summer.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Cute style and comfortable!!
customer_reviews.text: Cute style and comfortable!!! This is my first pair of Chaco's and I want more!!!! Good arch support, while looking nice... a hard combo to come by!
customer_reviews.author: lnkmom

customer_reviews.title: Hopeful for a better fit
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love these shoes. I've recently had trouble with plantar fasciitis and was told by my podiatrist that I need to wear better shoes with good arch support. Vionic shoes work for me. This is my first pair from Chaco. They're cute but the straps across the top are tight on my big toes. I hope they stretch out before my upcoming trip to Disney World. Shoe stretchers don't work because of the diagonal straps. Fingers crossed!
customer_reviews.author: SandraK

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable toe strap
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these shoes because of the great reviews. They were a little big in the back of the shoe, which was worse after tightening the ankle strap to fit my small ankles. I wore these shoes for the first time in 90+ degree weather and walked over 9 miles (not smart). I had terrible blisters in multiple places and the toe strap became very tight and uncomfortable. The shoes were outside of the return window so I tried to make them work, but every time I wore them in the heat, the toe strap would tighten and make them very uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: kennon a largent

customer_reviews.title: Cute leather Chacos
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughter who has lots of ankle problems and wears traditional Chacos on a daily basis. These should not be purchased expecting to replace traditional Chacos, but these are a super cute option that offer good support as opposed to most fashion sandals. She also has a pair of the Sofia's, and they are just as cute and fashionable and offer the same support.
customer_reviews.author: ddreda

customer_reviews.title: These sandals are wonderful! I have been a long time Chaco wearer ...
customer_reviews.text: These sandals are wonderful! I have been a long time Chaco wearer and this is my first leather pair. They're perfect with dresses and skirts in warmer weather, and offer just as much support as traditional Chacos. Very happy I made this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: almcd23

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfortable sandals
customer_reviews.text: These are comfortable like my regular Chacos but look dressier. I normally wear an 8.5, the size 9 was a little big but the 8 fit great! The straps were a little tight at first but after a couple days of wear they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Run large
customer_reviews.text: These don't come in half sizes. I ordered a size 8, they were too big.
customer_reviews.author: M. Star

customer_reviews.title: I love regular Chaco sandals for their comfort
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes as a dressy alternative to my other Chaco sandals. I love regular Chaco sandals for their comfort. These leather Chacos fit comfortably, but are not as cushy as the traditional Chacos. Even still, I can wear them all day teaching without my feet hurting.
customer_reviews.author: Aubra L. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: good shoe
customer_reviews.text: shoe is good quality BUT I am an eight and bought an eight and fits like a nine.
customer_reviews.author: Krissy

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable for all day wear
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable for all day wear. However, I wish they came in half sizes. I am normally a 9.5 so I ordered a 10. They are about 1/2 inch too long for me but the straps adjust tight enough they stay on my feet. If they came in half sizes they would be the perfect sandal.
customer_reviews.author: Bgirl

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with these shoes. I find they support well & I had no problem wearing them all day. I did have to tighten the straps to help them fit a bit tighter. My foot is on the narrower size, but not so narrow that these were too wide. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Par

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THEM!!
customer_reviews.text: I have plantar fasciattis and these feel great on my feet upon unboxing!! Some of the most comfortable sandals I've ever put on. I have no doubt that they will be perfect for walking around in on an upcoming trip!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: ... a couple of years and they are the most comfortable flip-flops I have ever worn
customer_reviews.text: I have a pair of Chaco flip-flops that I have had for a couple of years and they are the most comfortable flip-flops I have ever worn, so I knew these sandals would also be comfortable since the style is very similar - at least in the footbed - and I knew the sizing would be good. I love these sandals! Good for casual dresses and for shorts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are still in great shape. LOVE ❤️
customer_reviews.text: They are a tad long but not enough to keep me from wearing them EVERYDAY. These shoes have walked MILES already!!! They are still in great shape. LOVE ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Diane Keys

customer_reviews.title: Comfy!
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. I manage a restaurant and wear them to work. No slipping in the kitchen at all, which is why I love the Chaco sandal. They are super comfy. Only setback is that when the leather footbed gets damp, it’s slippy.
customer_reviews.author: A. Clark

customer_reviews.title: These sandals are really nice. they can be dressed down with a pair ...
customer_reviews.text: These sandals are really nice. they can be dressed down with a pair of jeans or shorts or look nice with a dress.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Great dress-up dress-down sandal
customer_reviews.text: The footbed of these sandals is nothing like traditional chacos, so if that's what you're after this is not what you are looking for. However, if you're looking for a dress-up dress-down sandal that is cute and comfortable, these are great. I'm so happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Emma Jane

customer_reviews.title: Love these sandals
customer_reviews.text: Love these sandals. I wear a 9 or 8 1/2 W sometimes and I got the 9 and they fit nicely. Super comfy. Wish I had gotten another pair when they were on sale for 39.98 but I love them
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: So all in all great shoe so far
customer_reviews.text: I just got these so I can't speak to the durability but I normally wear a 8.5 , and they don't make half sizes in this style so I was worried about an 8 thinking they would be too small. Turns out they were actually too BIG. I was thinking the 7 would be WAY too small but turns out they actually fit me. So all in all great shoe so far, just make sure you order a size smaller then you usually wear.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Versatile. Not as durable as other Chacos.
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these sandal! They are great for traveling because they are comfortable to walk in all day but also look nice enough to wear out to dinner. The leather straps are as durable the regular Chaco straps but they are much more versatile. When I'm trying to travel light in the summer time, I always pack these as my only shoe option.
customer_reviews.author: Abi P.

customer_reviews.title: Like wearing a tank top for a bra...
customer_reviews.text: Pretty shoe. Durable quality. Zero support. This would be a great, wear-anywhere shoe if it had support. After wearing these all day, my plantar fasciitis hurst so bad, I can barely stand, let alone walk.
customer_reviews.author: Suni

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and Style
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite brand of shoe for its comfort. Theses don’t disappoint. The matching footbed and leather straps makes them dressier. Fits true to size for me (8.5).
customer_reviews.author: Z

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like these for my size 7 foot but they looked as though I was wearing boats...dimensions appeared to be off. They were very comfortable though!
customer_reviews.author: Curlygirl

customer_reviews.title: They were incredibly comfortable and also don't look like grandma sandals
customer_reviews.text: I bought these sandals on recommendation from a colleague who travels extensively. I brought them with for my trip to Europe and put many miles on these sandals. They were incredibly comfortable and also don't look like grandma sandals. :-) I will turn to this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Didn't get here in time for my trip to MX ...
customer_reviews.text: Didn't get here in time for my trip to MX, but kept for the summer, they are way cuter than my old Chaco's!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Dulock

customer_reviews.title: Elastic snapped within 3 months
customer_reviews.text: Buckle area began to stretch within a month of using these shoes, snapped completely and now no way to wear these. Nice while they lasted, but I'd expect a $100 pair of sandals to last more than 3 months of wear.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: These fit well and felt well, I just had ...
customer_reviews.text: These fit well and felt well, I just had to choose between these and the Juniper Sandal. The Juniper won because of the ankle strap.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: They are my favorite! Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I've had these sandals for just over a year. They are my favorite! Comfortable, cute, practical. I'm very disappointed that they have not held up, though. I recently noticed the stretchy material by the buckle is breaking down. For the cost, I expected these sandals to last more than 15 months.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Aberly

customer_reviews.title: Great fit.
customer_reviews.text: Exact foot fit. I do feel the comfort and cushion to my heel and ball of the foot when walking with them on. Straps are not too tight and fit well with adjustable straps if needed. Haven't gone on long walks on them yet.
customer_reviews.author: B. Rojas

product_meta.title: Chaco Women's Dorra Sandal
product_meta.description:
Full-grain leathers pair with comfortable pig-skin lining in our stylish dorra. Embroidered wave graphic on footbed in accent colors. Every pair comes standard with our podiatrist-certified luvseat pu footbed and an added layer of underfoot cushion.

Since 1989, Chaco has been creating great fitting product that outlast the competition - footwear that can be repaired rather than pitched into a landfill. Chaco focuses on fit, function, comfort and quality with a full line of footwear, including hiking and river sandals, free-heel casual sandals, flips and new for 2007 a children's collection. All Chaco footwear features a biocentric footbed and has received the APMA Seal of Acceptance. Chaco maintains a triple bottom line of people, planet and profit, donating 3% of after-tax profits to organizations dedicated to caring for people and the planet.
feature_bullets: Outdoor sandal featuring slender leather straps with toe ring, crisscross vamp, backstrap, and adjustable buckle at ankle
Burnished leather footbed topsole with embroidered wave graphic
Women's-specific luvseat dual-density PU midsole with antimicrobial odor-control properties
Non-marking Eco Tread outsole made with 25% recycled rubber
